title: 037 - God Bless The Blue Angels
description: On today's show, the guys answer a few questions from the Boobz Brothers Downunder, which involves what type of animal the boys think they could kill the easiest with nothing more than a pocket knife, Billy Tubes makes some strong claims about his future involvement in The Shahk Gang, the guys find out Connor's new plant, Calypso, is actually highly poisonous and could kill everyone at The Pub, they chat about Nitrous Rush and some of the other car clubs that have long run Pittsburgh, and the guys try to decide whether or not The Blue Angels are still one of the most elite flying regiments in the world. Stay safe out there, and enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
